column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Joyce - Thanks for the review. It's always interesting to read which toppings our customers enjoy
column2: and which ones they don't. For example
column3: the fish powder we use in some of the ramens is definitely a hit-or-miss. As are the bamboo shoots
column4: though one explanation might be that we use fresh bamboo as opposed to canned. The flavor and texture tends to be a little more natural than the more commonly used canned bamboo.
